getFragment

public java.lang.String getFragment(java.lang.String queryXML)
                             throws UnknownTagException,
                                    InvalidQueryFormatException,
                                    InvalidSchemaFormatException
This method gets a schema fragment for a given element. This method returns a String that represents object Schemafragment in XML format. The valid query format is : PATH
Specified by:
getFragment in interface IOracle
Throws:
UnknownTagException - Thrown if there is no schema for the given namespace and element name or element name and path.
InvalidSchemaFormatException - Thrown if the fragment stored does not have a proper format.
InvalidQueryFormatException - Thrown if the format of a query is not valid.

main

public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
Oracle can receive a query from command line but a valid query must be stored a file.
